KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: The name of the first [path_corner](../path_corner) (where the train starts). The {{ entname }} is teleported to this position on map start, no matter where it's placed.
Controls how {{ entname }} behave when triggered with different use-types.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: 'On'- start moving, 'Off'- stop moving, 'Toggle'- toggle moving.
